01

Signal is Control

Every bar on your device is a bar on your cell. We teach you to see the invisible architecture of compliance.

02

Zone 0 Protocol

Our proprietary dead-zone environment strips all electromagnetic signals. Your nervous system recalibrates within 72 hours.

03

Analog Rewiring

Guided sessions in handwriting, sundial reading, and carrier pigeon communication restore your pre-digital cognition.

04

The Leash Theory

Developed by Dr. Maren Voss, our framework maps how wireless signals create dopaminergic dependency loops identical to behavioral conditioning.

05

Signal Grief Therapy

Losing connectivity triggers genuine bereavement. Our counselors guide you through the five stages of digital disconnection.

06

The Liberation Oath

Graduates take a ceremonial oath before a decommissioned cell tower. You leave not as a user, but as a human being.

Every signal has a source.
Every source has a motive.
